DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize treatment non-invasive spinal decompression reduces discogenic low back pain ( LBP ) , decrease visual analog pain scale score , increase activity daily live decrease medication use .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Activities Daily Living Adults With Chronic Low Back Pain Using Nonoperative Treatment Modality
DOC.criteria: least 18 year age ; consent physician prescribe protocol ; present discogenic low back pain define low back pain minimum 12 week ; current CT scan metastatic cancer ; previous spinal fusion placement stabilization hardware within 6 month ; instrumentation artificial disc ; neurologic motor deficit , bladder , sexual dysfunction ; alcohol drug abuse patient 's extreme height ( < 147 cm > 203 cm ) body weight ( > 136 kg ) .
